events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but I want to return it and get a refund because the size is incorrect and doesn't fit me at all.
The customer issue has been identified as a refund request due to sizing problems with the jacket purchased online.
Routing the refund case for the returned jacket to the refunds department for further processing.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket that did not fit.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket is still unused and it’s in the original packaging, so it should be eligible for a return.
Thank you for the information. You can ship the jacket back to us using the prepaid label we will email you shortly. Once we receive the item, a full refund will be processed.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate how quickly you’re handling this. I'll wait for the prepaid label email.
The refund procedure has been set up and the prepaid shipping label has been sent to the customer’s email for the return shipment.
We are following up to confirm that you have received the prepaid label and ask if you need any further assistance with your refund.
As we have not heard back from you, we have closed your refund case. Please contact us again if you need any more help.
